entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Snow level 2000 metres. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Snow level 2000 metres lowering to 1600 metres this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 70. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
